text: Beatriz Gutiérrez Müller (born 13 January 1969) is a Mexican writer and investigator. She is the wife of former President of Mexico Andrés Manuel López Obrador. She worked as a journalist, managing to work for El Universal while she lived in Puebla. Later on, she worked in the Mexico City government during Andrés Manuel López Obrador's time as Head of Government of Mexico City. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican journalists Category:Writers from Mexico City Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Mexico Category:People from Puebla (state)
title: Beatriz Gutiérrez Müller
